Sentencas: In this study the gas-tightness of reactive air brazed YSZ-steel joints and their long-term stability at high temperatures in air and dual atmospheres are investigated.
Titulo: Aging Behavior of Reactive Air Brazed Seals for SOFC

Sentencas: Silver-based braze compositions like Ag-4CuO are used for reactive air brazing of gas-tightness samples.
Titulo: Aging Behavior of Reactive Air Brazed Seals for SOFC

Sentencas: During aging in air at 850 degrees C for 800h all tested samples remained hermetic.
Titulo: Aging Behavior of Reactive Air Brazed Seals for SOFC

Sentencas: However, microstructural analysis reveals the formation of voids within the brazing zones and severe changes of the interfacial oxide layers.
Titulo: Aging Behavior of Reactive Air Brazed Seals for SOFC

Sentencas: It is shown, that due to the diffusion of chromium and manganese from the steel substrate the thickness of the reaction layers increases and the phase composition changes.
Titulo: Aging Behavior of Reactive Air Brazed Seals for SOFC

Sentencas: Furthermore, in previous work a decrease of the bending strength of reactive air brazed YSZ-steel joints due to the microstructural changes is observed.
Titulo: Aging Behavior of Reactive Air Brazed Seals for SOFC

Sentencas: In contrast, the aging in dual atmospheres at 850 degrees C causes strong degradation and the total loss of gas-tightness.
Titulo: Aging Behavior of Reactive Air Brazed Seals for SOFC

Sentencas: Reducing atmospheric conditions lead to different reactions profiles of the silver based brazes in contact with the YSZ electrolyte.
Titulo: Aging Behavior of Reactive Air Brazed Seals for SOFC

Sentencas: Complex reaction products are identified and reported.
Titulo: Aging Behavior of Reactive Air Brazed Seals for SOFC
